name: Police Car Parking Simulator 3D
description:
Its time to park your police car after a long day of chasing criminals in Police Station Parking! Drive a police car and park it to the allotted parking spots. Accomplish a lot of variety of missions to become a good cop.

Police Car Parking Simulation is a challenging police car driving and parking game that is basically made up of difficult parking spots and various awesome levels. In this game, you will be challenged to drive and park your police car to certain parking areas and you must park your car properly.

Take control of hot seat to park police cars as fast as you can without crashing with other cars and obstacles because the time is limited to complete the parking mission, so try to be as fast as possible. You must not also collide, otherwise the game can end very quickly. So you need to be the fastest and clever! As a real police cop you have to control theft and crime in the city and for this purpose you must be a extremly best driver to eliminate the crime. In this 3D simulation game, you will get a chance to practice all the required skills like driving, racing and parking. You need to race your car towards the parking area by following the guiding arrow and park your ride at pointed lot.

So have fun and improve your parking skills behind the wheels and happy driving! Enjoy Parking games!

Features:

• Police Car Parking offroad contains various car parking missions
• HD graphics with a realistic environment
• Different Game levels with parking hurdles
• Free Customization of 3D cars
• Realistic car controls, steering wheel, brake and gear
• Real car sounds and visual effects
• Smooth and Realistic Game play
• Realistic driving and parking experience
